basics.name: Chad Morita
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a M.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2021.

courses: ICS 111 - Introduction to Computer Science I
ICS 141 - Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science I
ICS 211 - Introduction to Computer Science II
ICS 241 - Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science II
ICS 390 - Computing Ethics for Lab Assistants

work.company: UH Mānoa Department of Earth Sciences
work.summary: Maintain projectors. Perform software updates and installations on lab computers. Light network/hardware troubleshooting duties. Help students and faculty with technical support. Perform updates to department website.

work.company: UH Mānoa Information & Computer Sciences Department
work.summary: Assist students in ICS 141 (Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science I) and ICS 211 (Introduction to Computer Science II) during lab sessions. Answer any questions related to course topics or homework.

Deliver Ka Leo O Hawaiʻi newspapers to approximately 60 distribution points on and around the Mānoa campus. Monitor each Ka Leo O Hawaiʻi delivery site on a regular basis, counting the number of newspapers remaining at each rack. Install, maintain, and repair newspaper circulation boxes. Train new Distribution Assistants. Assists with the needs of the BOP Circulation program.

work.company: Hālau I Ka Wēkiu/Pūpūkahi I Ke Alo O Nā Pua
work.summary: Responsible for running A/V presentations for performances at the Hawaiʻi Theatre.
Head Cashier at the Les Murakami Stadium and Stan Sheriff Center concessions
highlights: Distribute change to the cash registers before opening
Periodically check registers throught the shift to redistribute change
Count the end of the shift totals

volunteer.summary: Assist photography students working in the lab, checkout equipment, and maintain darkroom chemicals.
Assist students learning cybersecurity concepts in the classroom
highlights: Answer student's questions about classroom activities
Supervise students during capture the flag event on the UH Manoa Campus
Design activities to teach cybcersecurity principles

volunteer.organization: UH Mānoa Information & Computer Sciences Department
volunteer.summary: Assist students with course concepts during lab sessions. Hold open lab hours for 3 hours a week to give additional assistance to students. Prepare and teach one week of ICS 211 lab material (object-oriented programming and data structures).

awards.title: Manoa Dean's List
awards.date: Spring 2019, Fall 2017, Spring 2017, Fall 2016, Spring 2016, Fall 2015
awards.awarder: UH Manoa College of Natural Sciences
awards.summary: Undergraduate students are awarded the Dean's List distinction if they: (1) earn a semester grade point average of 3.5 or higher based on 12 credits or more taken for a grade, and (2) do not receive grades of W, I, F, or NC for that semester.

awards.title: UH Mānoa Summer Sophomore Merit Scholarship
awards.awarder: University of Hawaii at Mānoa Outreach College
awards.summary: Awarded to up to 200 UH Mānoa sophomore students based on merit.
